entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then partly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023
